txt.en: Found the White Hand tribe report
The Orc-tribes compete for the vast riches of the Redhorn Lodes. Each tribe is likely to gather information about the other in order to gain the upper hand.

You found a report about the other Orc-tribe. This is a vital piece of information, as it is a good record of the strengths and weaknesses of their tribe. The Dwarves of Orc-watch will find this invaluable.
The scouting report is hidden in each tribe's camp.\n\nEach tribe has been scouting the other's defences, locations of strategic points, and general mining operations.

'These scouting reports are mostly drawings and are very useful. This will surely help us dismantle the power struggle of these Orcs. \n\n'There are a few words written here that I cannot understand. I will bring these to Orc-watch or Twenty-first Hall to have someone familiar with Orkish text to translate for me.'
Ingifast's camp is on the stairs near Orc-watch.\n\nIngifast will be pleased to see the reports that you have gathered.
'You will have to place the bag in plain sight, without being seen and without warning the White Hand Orcs through the deaths of their scouts.'
Find the White Hand tribe report
Return reports to Ingifast near the Orc-watch
